metadata.title: CVE-2014-9556 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the qtmd_decompress function in libmspack 0.4 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (hang) via a crafted CABfile, which triggers an infinite loop.

criterions.comment: cabextract: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libmspack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
